ModuleDescription: This module aims to equip students with adequate skills and strategies to engage the native or other foreign speakers on more complex social and cultural issues. Students will learn to summarise texts of higher order thinking skills, structuring essays, collating linguistic means of expressions for improved language production and text cohesion. The module is intended to make students proficient language users.
Prerequisite: Completed LAM4201 Malay 5 or passed the placement test
